posts.post_content:
Scarce T213-3 Chief Bender for sale on my updated website. [url]http://t206.monkberry.com/[/url] Well loved with punch holes, paper loss and writing. $125.00. Offering 10% off on all cards until the end of October. Free shipping (not including insurance) on orders over $200.00. Lots of t213s and other new cards and many lowered prices.

Please email [url]edhans@monkberry.com[/url] to confirm. NO PM's. Check or money order only; NO PAYPAL. New York residents must add sales tax. Mail payments to: Ed Hans; PO Box 307; Buffalo, NY 14207. First come, first served. Thank you.

[IMG]http://www.monkberry.com/~edhans/t213-3bend.jpg[/IMG]
